text: Datuk Seri Panglima Haji Lajim Ukin (15 June 1955 â€“ 29 August 2021) was a Malaysian politician. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for the Beaufort constituency in Sabah from 2008 to 2013. Ukin was a member of the United Malays National Organisation. Ukin was born in Beaufort, Malaysia. Ukin died on 29 August 2021 at a hospital in Kota Kinabalu, Malaysia of COVID-19, aged 66. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Malaysia Category:Malaysian politicians
title: Lajim Ukin
